code: @Manual{,   title = {pipaux: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow},   author = {R.Andres Castaneda and Tony Fujs and Aleksander Eilertsen},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.4.9001},   url = {https://pip-technical-team.github.io/pipaux/}, }

what: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow
title: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow
text: pipaux manages auxiliary data used PIP workflow. basically two things. [1] updates auxiliary data makes sure keep unchanged raw data modified. [2] loads data memory.

title: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow
text: can install development version GitHub : Even though pipaux 20 functions, features can executed using functions pipaux::load_aux pipaux::update_aux, wrappers measure-specific functions.

title: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow
text: Loading auxiliary data can done using function pipaux::load_aux, whose first argument name measure loaded. measures available cpi, gdp, pce, pfw, pop, ppp. , loading cpi database done typing, load_aux(measure = "cpi") pip_cpi("load").
code: identical(load_aux(measure = "cpi"), pip_cpi("load")) #> [1] TRUE identical(load_aux(measure = "ppp"), pip_ppp("load")) #> [1] TRUE identical(load_aux(measure = "pop"), pip_pop("load")) #> [1] TRUE

title: Management of auxiliary data in PIP workflow
text: Updating auxiliary data PIP uses syntax loading . Data updated using function pipaux::load_aux measure specific functions. version pipaux released, verified whether auxiliary database date. , functions seldom used. pipaux checks whether hash database changed updates data case changed. changed, notifies user. user can force update using force = TRUE part arguments.
code: # this,  update_aux(measure = "cpi") #> Data signature is up to date. #> No update performed  # is equivalent to this,  pip_cpi("update") #> Data signature is up to date. #> No update performed  # And this update_aux(measure = "ppp") #> Data signature is up to date. #> No update performed  # is equivalent to this,  pip_ppp("update") #> Data signature is up to date. #> No update performed

title: Fetch GDP data from WEO — pip_gdp_weo
text: Note recent version downloaded imf.org saved .xls file <maindir>/_aux/weo/. filename following structure WEO_<YYYY-DD-MM>.xls. Due potential file corruption file must opened re-saved can updated pip_gdp_weo(). Hopefully future IMF stop using .xls file really xls.

text: fix bugs installation fix bugs devtools::check() change directory paths paste0() fs::path()

title: pipaux 0.0.3
text: Add handling non-calendar years WDI data GDP PCE. now converted fiscal year values. #62

title: pipaux 0.0.3
text: survey metadata file set Set distribution_type “micro, imputed” imputed surveys Add survey year column survey metadata file # pipaux 0.0.3 Initial release used PIP soft-launch February 9, 2022 # pipaux 0.0.2 load global variables gls using pipload::pip_create_globals() pipload::add_gls_to_env()
